items.name: Bun
items.update_check_command: if brew list bun >/dev/null 2>&1; then brew outdated --quiet bun; else echo ''; fi
items.update_command: if brew list bun >/dev/null 2>&1; then brew upgrade bun; else echo 'bun is not managed by brew'; fi

items.name: Claude Code
items.description: Auto-check via GitHub releases; update manually with claude update

items.name: Google Gemini CLI
items.description: Auto-check via npm registry; update manually with npm upgrade
items.current_version_command: if command -v gemini >/dev/null 2>&1; then gemini --version | sed -E 's/[^0-9]*([0-9]+\.[0-9]+\.[0-9]+).*/\1/'; else echo ''; fi

items.name: Codex CLI
items.description: Auto-check via Homebrew cask metadata; update manually with brew upgrade --cask
items.latest_version_command: HOMEBREW_NO_AUTO_UPDATE=1 brew info --cask codex --json=v2 | sed -nE 's/.*"version":[[:space:]]*"([^"]+)".*/\1/p' | head -n 1

items.name: Oh My Zsh
items.description: Auto-check git HEAD; update manually via OMZ upgrade script
items.current_version_command: if [ -d "${ZSH:-$HOME/.oh-my-zsh}/.git" ]; then git -C "${ZSH:-$HOME/.oh-my-zsh}" rev-parse --short=12 HEAD; else echo ''; fi
items.latest_version_command: if [ -d "${ZSH:-$HOME/.oh-my-zsh}/.git" ]; then REMOTE="$(git -C "${ZSH:-$HOME/.oh-my-zsh}" config --get remote.origin.url 2>/dev/null || echo https://github.com/ohmyzsh/ohmyzsh.git)"; git ls-remote "$REMOTE" HEAD 2>/dev/null | awk '{print substr($1,1,12)}' | head -n 1; else echo ''; fi
items.update_command: if [ -x "${ZSH:-$HOME/.oh-my-zsh}/tools/upgrade.sh" ]; then "${ZSH:-$HOME/.oh-my-zsh}/tools/upgrade.sh" -v minimal; else echo 'oh-my-zsh not found'; exit 1; fi
